mutants.original_line: s1 = ''.join(ch for ch in s1 if ch.isalnum()).lower()
mutants.mutated_line: s2 = ''.join((ch for ch in s2 if ch.isalnum())).lower()

mutants.original_line: s2 = ''.join(ch for ch in s2 if ch.isalnum()).lower()
mutants.mutated_line: s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in s2 if ch.isalnum())).lower()
